item.title: Welcome to brennan.cafe
item.description: Welcome to brennan.cafe! ðŸŒ» I’m excited to launch my new homelab project! This is the beginning of my journey to build a more ethical, privacy-respecting digital infrastructure. What is brennan.cafe? brennan.cafe is my personal homelab running on a 2011 ThinkPad W520. It’s a practical exploration of: De-Googling: Replacing corporate cloud services with self-hosted alternatives Privacy: Building systems that respect user privacy Learning: Hands-on experience with backend/server administration Ethics: FOSS only, no surveillance, no tracking The Stack Hardware: ThinkPad W520 (Intel i7, 12GB RAM) OS: Lubuntu 24.
